description.narrative: Food safety: There is a need for investments in China''s TCL industry, as many existing refrigeration facilities are obsolete and old. New cold chain facilities with enhanced technology will contribute to improved product quality and reduce product loss, thereby ensuring a higher standard for food safety, which ultimately will benefit the consumers. Cold storage supply chain efficiency: The industry is fragmented and characterized by small and medium players, who do not provide integrated services, which leads to inefficiencies in the cold storage supply chain. The investment in Zhengming contributes to the industry consolidation and increased efficiencies, as the Company is already acquiring other smaller competitors and providing integrated cold storage supply chain services. Rural reach: The investment will contribute to balanced rural-urban development, and reduce the gap between living standards in urban and rural areas, as Zhengming targets to expand to become a nationwide TCL provider with TCL warehouses and transportation network in provinces such as Sichuan, Yunnan, Chongqing, Hubei and Hunan.

Shanghai Zhengming Transport Co. Ltd. (Zhengming or the Company) is a leading temperature controlled logistics (TCL) company based in Shanghai, China. Currently, the Company is present in more than 50 cities and has 12 temperature controlled (TC) warehouses with a total of 36,695 square meters spread across China. Zhengming also owns and operates approximately 262 TC trucks in its transportation division and has access to an additional 450 TC trucks through sub-contractors. In order to strengthen its position and to take advantage of a fast growing market, the Company plans to expand its TC warehousing capacity to 113,695 square meters, increase its TC truck fleet, improve IT systems and acquire smaller TC companies (the Project). The Project is expected to be implemented during 2014 and 2015. Implementation of the Project has commenced and the Company is on track to complete the Project over the scheduled time frame.
